column1: This file will be used to upload data to the NelsonDB. FIELD NAMES CAN BE ADDED, BUT SHOULD BE DONE SPARINGLY

column2: For recording info about a floatation separation test that was done on a sample.

column4: The Sample ID for the sample that was run through the floatation test. The Sample ID is a unique id.
The sample name that was defined with the sample ID above. The sample name is a human readable name.
If the separation was done by density, mass, optical, spectral, chemical, size, or other means.
A name for the aparatus that performed the separation.
The specific gravity of the liquid, if a liquid density separation was performed. Leave blank if not applicable.
The weight in grams of the light/top/upper fraction.
The weight in grams of the medium/middle/intermediate fraction.
The weight in grams of the heavy/bottom/lower fraction.
The percent of the sample that was in the light/top/upper fraction.
The percent of the sample that was in the medium/middle/intermediate fraction.
The percent of the sample that was in the heavy/bottom/lower fraction.
If an operating factor is at play, for example, the power or speed of the motor.
Any additional comments about the separation.
